feature1.explanation: Both texts show the use of hyphens, commas, quotation marks, and parentheses in a similar manner.

feature2.explanation: Both texts exhibit lexical diversity and variation in word choice. They also demonstrate grammatical complexity.

feature3.explanation: Sentence structures in both texts show complexity and variation in length. They maintain coherence and cohesion.

feature4.explanation: Both texts display a similar tone and mood, utilizing narrative styles and idiomatic expressions.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were found in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the consistency in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, text and discourse features, and absence of spelling errors, the likelihood of the texts being written by the same author is moderately high.
